title: Bug 7861Multiple enabled decorators doesn't work
description: Bug 7861Multiple enabled decorators doesn't work If you load the org.eclipse.team.
OB: If you have two decorators enabled at the same time only one of them wins andgets to decorate. projects fromdev.eclipse.org and enable both the CVS and Team Examples decorators then createa CVS project and an Example (file system provider) both decorations are nevershown although both decorators are enabled.
SR: projects fromdev.eclipse.org and enable both the CVS and Team Examples decorators then createa CVS project and an Example (file system provider) both decorations are nevershown although both decorators are enabled.
